column2: Convinced senior leaders of pharma manufacturer to partner with industry players they had not considered to proactively address emerging trends; developed executable roadmap; opportunity for $1B+ revenue lift and improved patient access

Built and managed product migration model and owned strategy to transition three facilities to an omnichannel distribution center for UK-based retailer; developed advisory relationships with executives including SVP of Global Supply Chain
Identified cost savings of 10% across the 20 least energy efficient buildings and delivered an analytics tool to support continuous sustainability planning for an $11B American apparel corporation
Managed complex staffing and cost model for $47B healthcare insurer, leading to $9M investment; supported business process reengineering to help align with Healthcare Reform legislation

Designed and implemented business operations from scratch and recruited and trained 20-member team for new business venture aimed at extended stay travelers; launched in 300 hotel rooms and increased occupancy by 70% in two months

Developed strategy and streamlined new product to improve social media response efficiency by 95% and helped OYO win award for "Best Use of Social Media for Customer Experience" over 50+ competing brands

Conceptualized new app to track key performance indicators for 60-member field team and drive team efficiency, and to capture customer data in six previously unexplored areas and drive marketing strategies

Managed one of Schlumberger's largest business units in South America (90-member team); delivered an annual average revenue of $25M with a 5% average yearly increase by improving service quality and operational efficiency
